U

UpAction - Class in Controller
 
UpAction(GameFrame, Model) - Constructor for class Controller.UpAction
 
updateCellGrid() - Method in class Model.Model
Updates the Cell grid according to the Board object Uses getTileColor(int) method to decode the color from Settings object according to current theme and value of tile Uses Cell.setValue(int) and Cell.setCellColor(Color) to update every Cell object's value and color
updateNumber() - Method in class Model.Number
Doubles the value of the Number object
updatePartControl() - Method in class View.ScorePanel
updates each field as each move happens
updateScore(int) - Method in class Model.Score
Method to increase score variable by specified amount and handle the high Score.
updateScorePanel() - Method in class View.GameFrame
updates the score in scorePanel calls updatePartControl() in ScorePanel class
updateScores() - Method in class Model.Model
Records the high score and highest value of cell from Board class in Model class Uses Board.getGameScore() to retrieve Score object from Board class Uses Score.getHighScore() for high score Uses Board.getHighCell() for highest value of cell from Board
